page.title: 18HEALTHCARE:SCAMBLESBY AREA
page.content: This is a rural area,so there are no big hospitals nearby,and people have to travel long distances to visit doctors & dentists.There are two small hospitals in the area about 7 miles away, catering mainly for the elderly and people needing minor surgery. If people need nursing but are not ill enough for hospital treatment,they are visited in their homes by district nurses who look after the patient and help the family. Usually{babies are born in hospital} but are sometimes born at home.The mothers are looked after by midwives: specially-trained nurses who can deliver babies.Children under 5yrs.are checked by health visitors who visit their homes to see that the child is developing properly.They also ensure that the necessary injections are given to protect them from disease.
